original_text: And in the uppermost basket there was of all manner of bakemeats for Pharaoh; and the birds did eat them out of the basket upon my head.
korean_text: 맨 윗광주리에 바로를 위하여 만든 각종 구운 음식이 있는데 새들이 내 머리의 광주리에서 그것을 먹더라

sentences.original_text: there was of all manner of bakemeats for Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 바로를 위한 모든 종류의 구운 음식이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the birds did eat them
out of the basket upon my head
